text: Of course. Ottawa left, Newfoundland right!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Oh no!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: How could you be so stupid!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: There's no way we can go all the way back. We'll never make it now!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: It's okay, boys. The power is inside us to get to Ottawa! We can wish ourselves there!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Ah yes, let's wish ourselves there.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Is it working?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Oh, God-damnit! Well I warned you Kyle! I told you if I missed Christmas we were gonna throw down!  Well it's on! We're gonna have it our RIGHT NOW!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Of course, we could always take my boat, eh?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Oh yes! On the river we could travel to Ottawa in no time!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Well come on!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Okay, next stop, the new Prime Minister.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Do you think we can still make it in time?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: We'd better, Kyle. Or you're dead.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: The Parliament building, dawn. Steve and the rest of the party pull up to the small dock at one end of the grounds

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Here we are at the Parliament buildin'.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Ze Prime Minister is inside.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Well come on, let's hurry! It's almost Christmas!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: The Parliament building, entrance. Kyle knocks on the heavy wooden doors. A wooden panel opens up to reveal a window. A doorman looks out through it

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Yes?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: We need to see the new Prime Minister.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Ha! Impossible! The new Prime Minister isn't seeing anybody!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Oh well, zo much for zat.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Yeah, we gave it our best, but our best wasn't good enough, eh?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: No. No!!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Yes?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Please, sir. I traveled a long way to get here. He's the only person who can help me.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: The Prime Minister isn't here. He's in China on official business. So you might as well go home. Good-bye!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Then that's it. I'm... I'm never going to get my brother back.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: And... I'm not going to get any Christmas presents.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: And... I'm not gonna have a Christmas adventure.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: (And I'm not gonna have a ...)

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Oh please! Please stop crying.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: I'm gonna kill you, Kyle.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: All right all right, I was lying. The Prime Minister IS here.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Really?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Yes yes. Come in.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: The Parliament building, inside. The group walks down a long hallway and approach a large sanctum with three fire pits. Two small ones burn before and on each side of the huge one, which sits at the center and has a holograph of the Prime Minister hovering over it

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: I am the Prime Minister of Canada. What do you guys want?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Sir, you recently passed a new law allowing parents who have given their children up for adoption to change their minds. My little brother was-

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Not so fast!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Ike!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Kyle!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Prime Minister, these are the child's Canadian parents! Their Canadian blood pumps through his veins! Would you send him back to America with those world-hungry scum?!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Please, sir. I came because I don't think Ike belongs here. Family isn't about whose blood you have in you, family is about the people who cared about you and took care of you. We're not the same blood, but I love my little brother. We've taken care of him because he needed us to, and that makes us more family than anything.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: That is a great speech, guy. But the answer is no! All of my new laws will stay in effect forever!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Haha, you lose, Americans!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Then, I suppose us mounties will never get our horses.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: And we won't get our wine.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: And we can't perform sodomy, eh?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: But why are you making such strange laws??

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: I SAID GO!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: (Gah!)

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Oh my God, they've killed Kenny!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: You... bastards!  Wha, what the hell is wrong with you?? What kind of Prime Minister bases his decisions on hatred? And, and takes away mounties' horses? And French people's wine? What the hell kind of Prime Minister are you, anyway?!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: I am the Prime Minister of Canada. I can do whatever I-  Uh oh. Uh, don't mind that guy hiding in the spider hole, he's just my friend.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: What the hell??

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Hey, that looks like Saddam Hussein!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Saddam Hussein?? Naw, relax, baby. I'm not him.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Zat explains everything! Za new Prime Minister was Saddam Hussein, once again trying to take over our beloved Canada like he did before.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Saddam Hussein?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: He was fooling us?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Get him!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Ahh, don't shoot. I want to negotiate. Hey, relax!  Gah!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Wait a minute. This means all the Prime Minister's new laws are null and void. We can have our horses back!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: And we can drink our wine.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: And I can sodomize me boys again

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Young man, you... must really care for Peter to have come all this way.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Perhaps we were wrong to try and take Peter back. He doesn't belong here. He belongs with his family.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Peter, would you like to go back to your home in Colorado?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: What is that?

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: It's Christmas. We officially missed it. It's Christmas Day and ... I'm in Canada.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Wull yeah, but ah-I got my brother back.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Yeah! You got your brother back, but I didn't get any presents!  And what did I tell you, Kyle?!  I told you that if we didn't make it back in time for Christmas I was gonna whup your ass, didn't I?!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Dude, come on.

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Well now you're gonna get it, motherfucker! That's right! You and me! Right now! We're havin' it out! Let's go! Come on! Come on!!  Mooooooom! Moooooooom!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Ey, come on, boys! You can spend Christmas with us, Canada style!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Ottawa, day. A Christmas parade goes by and the crowds cheer and throw confetti. Saddam is paraded on his own float, with huge candy canes around him

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Ding dong, they caught Saddam! Merry Christmas to the world!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
role: Ding dong, the Americans caught Saddam!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Santa's sleigh passes by and the boys are hoisted into it

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
role: Now Canada is free for you and you and me

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
role: It's the best Christmas presents we ever got

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
role: Canadian Christmas, it's the best! We drink and dance and show
text: our breasts!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
role: Let's celebrate! Saddam Hussein's been caught!

title: IT S CHRISTMAS IN CANADA
text: Oh well. Maybe we'll get to have a Christmas adventure next year.
